title: Aldi Is Flogging Retro Toys From Next Week Incl. A My Little Pony Collection From 1983
text:
Supermarket god of unusual brands Aldi is launching a retro toy sale next week, and it includes a full collection of My Little Pony toys in the original 1980s mould.

From October 30th, the full retro toy collection will be available from Aldi stores – for a v. limited time, obviously. It includes everything from retro Battleship, Mr Potato Head and his spud wife Mrs Potato Head, air hockey table top games, activity books, Diecast model cars, Dr Seuss Books, and of course the 1983-style My Little Pony toys: Cotton Candy, Butterscotch, Blue Belle, Snuzzle, Minty and Blossom.

LOOK AT THEIR LIL BUM SPARKLES:

They’re being flogged for $12.99 and there’s limited stock, so if you’re desperate to get your hands on one, see you in the line outside Aldi before it opens, I guess?

Check out the rest of the sale here.
description: Aldi's retro toy sale, from October 30, includes a collection of My Little Pony dolls in the original mould from the 1980s and where do we sign up.
